Name: Skin Scuba Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
A day for Skin Scuba. This Mount skill allows you to travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
A day for Skin Scuba. This Mount skill allows you to travel very fast. Double-click your destination on the World Map and you will fly automatically toward it along the navigation route. (Auto flight is available only on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)

[Master Level: 1]
A day for Skin Scuba. This Mount skill allows you to travel very fast.
